alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 12 at 1:41PM MST until December 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Most of Coconino and Navajo counties and the mountains of Yavapai county. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may damage property and cause power outages. Moderate to heavy rain and snow are also expected to accompany this strong cold front passage causing areas of reduced visibility in blowing snow and dangerous travel.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
